I'm a poet and i didn't know it. :) Just kidding, I knew it all along...
 
 I am the monster Albatross, 
 to you I'm just a bird.
 And yet I fly and see the World,
 as Humans never could.
 
 Not without a plane that is, 
 or some other device you make.
 I am the monster Albatross,
 in the heavens I feel most safe.
 
 I hunt and seek and feed myself,
 from the bounty of the Sea,
 Its supply of fish is endless,
 and I fish so naturally.
 
 I travel so free and my flock I lead,
 to new places we go to, instinctively.
 Our parents before us and theirs before them,
 led the way to the riches so abundant and free, 
 that the Oceans supply each new season we breed.
 
 I am the monster Albatross, 
 the master of all I see.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Monster Albatross:
